about_the_game:
Introducing this game 

"Let's escape from toys by blocking!"

You're a "Pico" trying to get back to the stationery. Pilot the Pico and get out of the house

"GOHome_PICO" is an action, flatformer, puzzle game

It's simple to manipulate

There are save points in the game whenever you avoid a puzzle or trap.

Players can use movements and jumps to solve traps and puzzles and attack enemies to kill them

In "GOHome_PICO", toys and items that you used to play at home come out as objects

And there are items that PICO can use

Story

The grandfather, who ran the stationery store, gives his toys to his grandson at the same time as the stationery store closes.

But Pico, a doll his grandfather made himself, tries to get back to him and other toys that he thinks are abandoned prevent him from going

A game in which Pico goes back home using toys reminiscent of a child's playroom, and the components of the house and room

Control

Players can control and play Pico so that it can go back to the stationery

The controls are very simple. The player moves with WASD

Jump using the Space bar and can be attacked with mouse clicks

You can interact using E,F keys

name: GOHome_PICO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update for Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 | Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 14393.102 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 | Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: GOHome_PICO is a puzzle action flatformer game. Blocking Pico, getting equipment away from toys It's a game where you escape the house while avoiding puzzles
